吪字的基本解释

吪
é
行动：“尚寐无吪。”
教化；感化：“周公东征，四国是吪。”
（鸾和凤凰一类鸟）死：凤靡鸾吪。
古同“讹”，错误。
古同“哦”，歌唱。

吪
huā
口开。

吪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［é］
［《廣韻》五禾切，平戈，疑。］
(1)动；行动。
(2)感化，教化。
(3)谓鸾鸟的死亡。
(4)通“訛”。讹误。
(5)通“哦”。吟哦；歌唱。

吪字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　吪； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页178第12
【唐韻】五禾切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】吾禾切，?音囮。【說文】動也。【詩·王風】尚寐無吪。【傳】吪，動也。【釋文】吪，本亦作訛。又【小雅】或寢或訛。【玉篇】引《詩》作吪。【廣韻】本作訛，亦作譌。【小雅釋文】韓詩作譌。譌，覺也。　又【廣韻】化也。【詩·豳風】周公東征，四國是吪。【傳】吪，化也。【釋文】吪，又作訛。　又【廣韻】謬也。　又【集韻】【韻會】?乎瓜切，音譁。口開也。　【集韻】或作?，僞。

吪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
吪字的起名意思

暂无。

Ye

Ye
é
Action: "I still have no wives."
Enlightenment; Probation: "Zhou Gong's eastward campaign, the Four Kingdoms are the men."
(Birds like Luan and Phoenix) Die: Feng Miluan.
Gu Tong "corrupted", wrong.
Gu Tong "Oh", sing.
Ye
huā

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [é]
["Guangyun" Wuhe cut, Ping Ge, doubt. ]
(1) Action; action.
(2) Probation and education.
(3) The death of Luan Bird.
(4) Through "corrupt". Corruption.
(5) Through "oh". Yin Oh; sing.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　吪; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 178 to 12
[Tang Yun] Five He Cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Wu He cuts,? Yin 囮. [Said the text] Move too. [Poetry·Wang Feng] There is still no wives. 【Biography】Yeah, move too. 【Explanation】Yeah, this is also an error. And [Xiaoya] either sleeps or goes wrong. [Jade articles] quoted from "Poems" for writing. [Guang Yun] This is a mistake, but also a jiao. 【Xiaoya Interpretation】Han Poetry Composes Jiao. Jiao, feel it too.　[Guang Yun] Hua Ye. [Poetry·Binfeng] Zhou Gong's eastward march, the Four Kingdoms are the ancestors. 【Biography】Yang, Huaye. 【Explanation】Yeah, another mistake.　[Guang Yun] It's also absurd.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Almost cut, sound. My mouth is open.　【Ji Yun】or make?, pseudo.
